AddStorageLocationModal.errorExistingFol: Foda iyi ili kale pa mndandanda wa malo osungira zinthu
AddStorageLocationModal.newStorageLocati: Njira ya fayilo yopezera malo atsopano osungira zinthu

Koperani ndipo yikani njira ya fayilo kuchokera ku seva yanu ya Kolibri yokhala ndi matchanelo a Kolibri. Mwachikhazikitso, matchanelo otumizidwa ku malo osungira kuchokera ku Kolibri adzasungidwa mu foda yotchedwa KOLIBRI_DATA_DIR.
AvailableChannelsPage.documentTitleForRe: Matchanelo omwe alipo pa Kolibri Studio
AvailableChannelsPage.importChannelsHead: Sankhani ma tchanelo oti m'pezemo ntchito yochita
ChannelTokenModal.tokenExplanation: Matokeni a tchanelo amatsekula matchanelo omwe sali pa m'ndandanda pa Kolibri Studio
ChannelUpdateModal.channelUpdateExplanat: Tchanero chomwe mwasankha kuti mutenge chisinthidwa kukhala chatsopano. Tipitirize?
ChannelUpdateModal.title: Ikani zatsopano mu tchanelo
CommonDeviceStrings.newEnabledPluginsSta: Mukachotsa chizindikiro chowonetsa kuti mwasankha tsamba, tsambalo silidzawonedwa ndi ogwiritsa ntchito ena ngakhale ali ndi chilolezo cholipeza tsambali.
CommonDeviceStrings.notEnoughSpaceForCha: Malo osungira zinthu ndiochepa. Fufutani zinthu zina kuti mukhale ndi malo osungira zinthu ambiri
CommonDeviceStrings.primaryStorageLabel: Zipangizo zomwe zangotsitsidwa kumene pa intaneti zidzayikidwa m'malo osungiramo oyambirira
ContentTreeViewer.topicHasNoContents: Foda iyi ilibeso mafoda ena mkati mwake kapena zinthu zina
ContentWizardUiAlert.channelNotFoundOnSe: Tchanelo yotumiza kuchokera mu seva sikupezeka
ContentWizardUiAlert.driveError: Zinazake zalakwika potsegula drive yolumikizidwa ku seva
ContentWizardUiAlert.driveNotWritableErr: Ndi zosatheka kuika zinthu mu drive
ContentWizardUiAlert.networkLocationDoes: Chipangizo cha ID imeneyi chilibe tchanelo yoyenera
ContentWizardUiAlert.networkLocationUnav: Padakali pano padakalibe seva ya Kolibri pa chipangizo chimene mwasankha
DeleteResourcesModal.confirmationQuestio: Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kufufuta ziyangoyango izi?
Mukutsimikiza kuti mukufuna kufufuta ziyangoyango izi?

DeleteResourcesModal.deleteEverywhereLab: Fufutaniso zidutswa za zomwe mwafufuta zomwe zatsalira m'malo ndi m'matchanero ena
DeviceInfoPage.advancedDescription: Izi zingakuthandizeni pofufuza vuto kapena kutumiza lipoti la vuto
DeviceNameModal.deviceNameExplanation: Perekani dzina lomveka bwino la chipangizo chimenechi kuti inuyo ndi anthu ena omwe ali mu netiweki yanu muziyizindikira mosavuta
DeviceSettingsPage.DownloadOnMeteredConn: Ngati ogwiritsa ntchito pa chipangizochi akugwiritsa nchito Kolibri wa data yochepa, iwo akuyenera kulipira ndalama zowonjezera pa intaneti ya pa lamya.
DeviceSettingsPage.alertDisabledOptions: Njira zina zoyikira zayimitsidwa chifukwa cha momwe Kolibri wayikidwira m'chipangizochi
DeviceSettingsPage.alertDisabledPaths: Kolibri uyu sanayikidwe mnjira yoti ayendetse yekha mafayilo ake a zipangizo zophunzirira.
DeviceSettingsPage.alertDisabledPlugins: Kolibri uyu sangakwanitse payekha kuyambitsanso magwiridwe a ntchito pa tsamba la ogwiritsa ntchito. Kayendetsedwe ka masamba omwe atsekulidwa kale adzachitika motsata malamulo a Kolibri, ndipo Kolibri adzayenera kuyambitsidwanso.
DeviceSettingsPage.allowDownload: Lolani kutsitsa zinthu kudzera pa intaneti ya palamya
DeviceSettingsPage.allowDownloadOnMetere: Tsitsani zinthu kudzera pa intaneti ya palamya
DeviceSettingsPage.allowExternalConnecti: Perekani chilolezo choti anthu ena omwe ali mu netiwekiyi azitsekula Kolibri pachingizochi pogwiritsa ntchito bulawuza

Ngati ophunzira apatsidwa chilolezo cholowa popanda kulowetsa nambala yachinsinsi pachipangizochi, anthu ena azitha kugwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zina poona zinthu zokhudza akaunti yanu ndipo zimenezi zikhoza kusokoneza chitetezo chanu.
DeviceSettingsPage.allowGuestAccess: Lolani anthu kupeza zinthu asanalowe mkati
DeviceSettingsPage.allowLearnersDownload: Lolani ogwiritsa ntchito kuwona zipangizo zomwe iwo alibe, komanso kuzipatsa chizindikiro pofuna kuti Kolibri azitsitse yekha zikapezeka pa netiweki yawo.
DeviceSettingsPage.disallowGuestAccess: Ophunzira akuyenera kulowa mkati kuti ayang'ane zinthu
DeviceSettingsPage.doNotAllowDownload: Musalole kutsitsa zinthu kudzera pa intaneti ya palamya
DeviceSettingsPage.enableAutoDownload: Pangitsani kuti itsitse yokha pa intaneti
DeviceSettingsPage.enableAutoDownloadDes: Kolibri adzatsitsa yekha maphunziro, makwizi ndi zophunzirira zina pa mndandanda wa 'zotsitsa zanga'.
DeviceSettingsPage.lockedContent: Ophunzira omwe alowa azingowona zinthu zomwe zili mkalasi mwawo
DeviceSettingsPage.pageDescription: Zimene musinthe pano zikhudza chipangizo chanu chokha basi.
DeviceSettingsPage.primaryStorageDescrip: Matchanelo a Kolibri akusingidwa pano. Zophunzirira zopezeka kumene zidzayikidwa pa malo awa.
DeviceSettingsPage.secondaryStorageDescr: Kolibri idzawonetsa matchanelo omwe asungidwa m'malo awa. Malo a zinthu zongowerenga sangakhale malo oyambirira osungira zinthu.
DeviceSettingsPage.setStorageLimit: Ikani mlingo wa kutsitsa pa intaneti kwa pakokha ndi kutsitsa kopangidwa ndi wophunzira
DeviceSettingsPage.setStorageLimitDescri: Kolibri sadzatsitsa zinthu yekha zinthu mopitirira mlingo woyikidwa wa malo osungira pa chipangizochi
DeviceSettingsPage.unlistedChannels: Lolani zipangizo zina kuti zithe kuwona komanso kutenga matchanelo amene sali pa mndandanda
DriveList.noDriveWithSelectedChannelErro: Palibe ma drive a tchanelo imene mwasankha omwe alumikizidwa ku seva
DriveList.noExportableDrives: Sitinathe kupeza malo titumizeko zinthu kunja kwa kompyuta yanu
DriveList.noImportableDrives: Palibe USB kapena malo osungiramo zinthu amene alumikizidwa ku seva.
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.deviceNotConnecte: Pakadali pano chipangizochi sichili cholumikiza ku netiweki.
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.removeDeviceLabel: Chotsani chipangizo pa mndandanda wa kalumikizidwe
EditDeviceSyncSchedule.removeDeviceWarni: Mwatsala pang'ono kuti muchotse chipangizochi pa mndandanda wa kalumikizidwe.
FilteredChannelListContainer.noMatchingI: Palibe matchanero ofanana ndi zomwe mukusaka
FilteredChannelListContainer.numChannels: {count, number, integer} {count, plural, one {tchanelo} other {matchanelo}} alipo
ManageContentPage.editChannelOrder: Sinthani zina pa kayalidwe ka matchaero
ManagePermissionsPage.devicePermissionsD: Sinthani zimene munthu angasinthe pa chipangizo chanu
ManageSyncSchedule.introduction: Ikani mndandanda kuti Kolibri ayambe yekha kulumikizana ndi zipangizo zina za Kolibri zokhalanso ndi zinthu zomwezi. Zipangizo zokhala ndi mndandanda umodzi zipezeka mu mgwirizanowu imodziimodzi.
NewChannelVersionPage.channelIsIncomplet: Kope ya '{channel}' ndi yosamaliza. Ili ndi {resourcesInChannel} mwa {totalResources} zochokera ku tchanelo yoyamba
NewChannelVersionPage.resourcesToBeDelet: Mukakonzanso tchaneloyi poyikamo zinthu zatsopano, zipangizo zina zichotsedwa. Izi zisokoneza maphunziro kapena mafunso amene akugwiritsa ntchito zipangizo zochotsedwazo
NewChannelVersionPage.versionChangesHead: Imasintha ngati mukufuna kusintha kuchoka ku {KapangidweKakale} kupita ku {KapangidweKatsopano}:
PermissionsChangeModal.manageContentMess: Mwapasidwa mphamvu zogwirisa ntchito matchanelo komanso zinthu pa makina awa
PermissionsChangeModal.superAdminMessage: Tsopano mukhoza kusintha matchanelo kapena zilolezo za ma akaunti a anthu ena. Dziwani zambiri pa gawo la Zilolezo.
PinAuthenticationModal.incorrectPin: Namambala yanu ya chinsinsi ndi yolakwika, chonde yesaninso
PinAuthenticationModal.invalidPin: Lowetsani manambala okwana 4 kuti akhale nambala yanu ya chinsinsi
RearrangeChannelsPage.editChannelOrderTi: Sinthani zina pa kayalidwe ka matchaero
RearrangeChannelsPage.failureNotificatio: Papezeka vuto nthawi yoyikanso ma tchanelo mndandanda
RearrangeChannelsPage.instructions: Longosolani momwe ma tchanelo angawonekere kwa ophunzira ndi aphunzitsi
RemoveFacilityModal.cannotRemoveOwnFacil: Ma Supa adimini sangachotse malo omwe iwowo ali membala wake.
RemoveFacilityModal.facilityReloadExplan: Ngati mwagwirizanitsa malo amenewa ku Tsamba la Kolibri kapena ku chipangizo china chomwe chili mu netiweki yanu, mukhoza kuyitsekulanso mu chipangizochi.
RemoveFacilityModal.removingFacilityConf: Ndikumvetsa zimene zichitike ndikachotsa malo amenewa
RemoveFacilityModal.signInAsOtherAdminEx: Simungachotse malo amene akaunti yanu ndi membala wake. Kuti muchotse '{facilityName}', tsekulani akaunti ya supa adimini pamalo osiyana ndi amenewa kenako lowani.
RemoveStorageLocationModal.deleteFilesDe: Ngati mukufuna kufufuta mafayilowa m'chipangizo chanu mutachotsa malo osungira, muyenera kutero mwanokha kuchokera ku mafayilo opezeka m'chipangizochi.
RemoveStorageLocationModal.removeStorage: Mukachotsa malo osungira, Kolibri sidzatha kuyifikira, koma zophunzirira sizidzafufutika m'chipangizo chanu.
SelectContentPage.importingFromDrive: Ikutenga kuchokera ku malo osungira zinthu '{driveName}'
SelectContentPage.problemFetchingChannel: Panali vuto kupeza zinthu patchanelo ichi
SelectContentPage.problemTransferringCon: Panali vuto kutumiza zinthu zomwe zasankhidwa
SelectDriveModal.notEnoughFreeSpaceWarni: Mulibe malo okwanira. Chotsani zinthu zina m'malo osungira zinthu kapena sankhani zipangizo zochepa
SelectDriveModal.problemFindingLocalDriv: Papezeka vuto pomwe timafufuza ma local drive.
SelectImportSourceModal.localDescription: Tengani zinthu kuchokera ku dalaivi. Matchanelo akuyenera kupititsidwa ku dalaivi ya makina a Kolibri ena
SelectImportSourceModal.localDrives: Lumikizani hard drive kapena memole kadi
SelectImportSourceModal.networkDescripti: Tengani zinthu kuchokela ku kompyuta ya Kolibri yomwe ikugwirisidwa ntchito pa makina omwe ali pa netiweki kapena pa intaneti yanu
SelectImportSourceModal.studioDescriptio: Lowetsani zophunzirira kuchokera ku Kolibri Studio ngati mwalumikiza ku intaneti
ServerRestartModal.enableOrDisableRequir: Pamene mwavomereza kapena mwakana tsamba, Kolibri adzayambanso ndipo muyenera kuyambitsanso msakatuli kuti muwone zomwe zasintha. Aliyense amene akugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri nthawi imeneyi paseva ino sadzalumikidwa kwa kanthawi kochepa.
ServerRestartModal.makePrimary: Pangani ichi kukhala malo oyambirira osungiramo
ServerRestartModal.newLocationRestartDes: Seva ikuyenera kuyambiranso kuti iwonjezere malo atsopano osungiramo .
ServerRestartModal.newPrimaryLocationRes: Seva ikuyenera kuyambiranso kuti iyike malo osungiramo atsopano. Aliyense amene akugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri pa sevayi nthawi ino sadzakwanitsa kwa kanthawi kochepa kuyifikira.
ServerRestartModal.removeLocationRestart: Kuchotsa malo osungiramo kudzapangitsa kuti seva iyambirenso.
ServerRestartModal.serverNeedsRestart: Seva iyenera kuyambiranso. Pangani izi nthawi yomwe seva sikugwiritsidwa ntchito kwambiri pofuna kupewa chisokonezo.
ServerRestartModal.serverRestartDescript: Aliyense amene akugwiritsa ntchito Kolibri pa sevayi nthawi ino sakwanitsa kuyifikira kwa kanthawi kochepa.
SyncAllFacilitiesModal.syncExplanation: Zimenezi zichititsa kuti malo onse olembetsedwa pa chipangizochi agwirizane ndi Tsamba la Kolibri.

UserPermissionsPage.superAdminExplanatio: Ali ndi zilolezo zonse zokhudza chipangizochi komanso angasinthe zilolezo za ma akaunti ena
Ali ndi zilolezo zokhudza adimini pamalo onse mu chipangizochi, koma akadali membala wa '{facilityName}'
WelcomeModal.learnOnlyDeviceWelcomeMessa: Choyamba mukuyenera kulowetsa matchanelo ena mu chipangizochi
Malipoti, maphunziro ndi mayeso sawoneka bwinobwino pokhapokha mutaika zinthu zokhudzana ndi zimenezo.
WelcomeModal.postSyncWelcomeMessage1: Choyamba mukuyenera kulowetsa matchanelo ena mu chipangizochi.
WelcomeModal.postSyncWelcomeMessage2: Malipoti a wophunzira, maphunziro, ndi makwizi omwe ali mu '{facilityName}' saonetsa bwinobwino pokhapokha ngati mwalowetsa zinthu zophunzirira zokhudzana ndi zimenezo.
WelcomeModal.welcomeModalContentDescript: Choyamba mukuyenera kulowetsa zinthu zophunzirira kuchokera ku gawo la Matchanelo.
WelcomeModal.welcomeModalPermissionsDesc: Akaunti ya supa adimini imene mwakhazikitsa kale ili ndi ma pelemishoni apadera ochitira zimenezi. Mungadziwe zambiri pa tabu ya Mapelemishoni nthawi ina.
